example.parse: ( (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (PP (P 与) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ-2 (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 通常)) (ADVP (AD 只有)) (PP-LGS (NP (QP (CD 几) (CLP (M 行))) (NP (NN 代码)))) (VP (VV 组成) (NP (-NONE- *-2))))) (DEC 的))) (ADJP (JJ 简单)) (NP (NN 电脑) (NN 病毒)))) (VP (VA 不同)))))
